title: Advanced Mathematics Learning Methods Based on Flipped Learning Using Mobile Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic calculus and core undergraduate mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning environment utilizing personal mobile devices, with integrated LMS and mobile application systems.

learning_goals: Learners can curate and analyze 10 self-directed mathematics concept video contents per week using mobile technologies (ChatGPT, YouTube, etc.)
Learners can share and provide feedback on complex mathematical problem-solving processes with peer learners at least twice weekly using mobile-based collaboration tools (online forums, etc.)
Learners can determine the mathematical accuracy of generative AI outputs at over 80% using an AI-generated content verification framework
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
